code: import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Toaster}from'react-hot-toast';import Login from'./pages/Login';import Dashboard from'./pages/Dashboard';import Wallet from'./pages/Wallet';import Referral from'./pages/Referral';import AdminCMS from'./pages/AdminCMS';import{AuthProvider,useAuth}from'./components/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,adminOnly=false}=_ref;const{user,loading}=useAuth();if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen",children:"Loading..."});if(!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});if(adminOnly&&user.role!=='admin')return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/dashboard"});return children;};function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Toaster,{position:"top-right"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/wallet",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wallet,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/referral",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Referral,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/admin",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{adminOnly:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminCMS,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/dashboard"})})]})]})})});}export default App;
